result.reason: RDP clipboard inheritance defaulting to 'No' on upgrade to v1.77.0 was identified by a commenter and is a config migration issue in a 6-year-old version; our fork is on v1.81.0 with redesigned connection inheritance and no reproduction reports since
result.approach: No fix needed — issue was resolved by users manually re-enabling clipboard inheritance; config migration for legacy upgrades is out of scope for current release
